attributes.action: Do not scrap the under 25 housing benefit!
attributes.additional_details:
Do not put an end to housing benefits for under 25's!

Young people have limited opportunities, with expensive university fees, lack of employment opportunities and limited spaces for apprenticeships.

Create more jobs and opportunities and less people will need to claim. Without job opportunities, thousands of under 25s would end up struggling to afford the cost of living or even end up on the street. A lot of people can not go back to live with their parents, or their parents aren't even around any more.
